## MentionExtensionOptions.onCharacterEntry() method

Called for each character entry and can be used to disable certain characters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onCharacterEntry?(params: OnCharacterEntryParams): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>OnCharacterEntryParams</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

## Remarks

For example you may want to disable all `@` symbols while the `at` matcher is active. Return true to stop the default character action.
